UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivatives.description: The net change in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of derivative instruments, including options, swaps, futures, and forward contracts, held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period.

UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Investments
UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Settlements with Taxing Authorities
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from settlements with taxing authorities.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsInterestOnIncomeT.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Interest on Income Taxes Accrued
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsInterestOnIncomeT.description: Amount of interest expense accrued for an underpayment of income taxes.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsPeriodIncreaseDec.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Period Increase (Decrease)
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsPeriodIncreaseDec.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in unrecognized tax benefits attributable to uncertain tax positions taken in tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits that Would Impact Effective Tax Rate
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.description: The total amount of unrecognized tax benefits that, if recognized, would affect the effective tax rate.

UtilitiesOperatingExpenseMaintenanceAndO.label: Utilities Operating Expense, Maintenance and Operations
UtilitiesOperatingExpenseMaintenanceAndO.description: Amount of operating expense for routine plant maintenance, repairs and operations of regulated operation.

ValuationAllowancesAndReservesBalance.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Amount
ValuationAllowancesAndReservesBalance.description: Amount of valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves.

ValuationAllowancesAndReservesChargedToC.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Additions, Charge to Cost and Expense
ValuationAllowancesAndReservesChargedToC.description: Amount of increase in valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves from charge to cost and expense.

ValuationAllowancesAndReservesChargedToO.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Additions, Charge to Other Account
ValuationAllowancesAndReservesChargedToO.description: Amount of increase in valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves from charge to accounts other than cost and expense.

ValuationAllowancesAndReservesDeductions.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Deduction
ValuationAllowancesAndReservesDeductions.description: Amount of decrease in valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves.

VariableLeaseCost.label: Variable Lease, Cost
VariableLeaseCost.description: Amount of variable lease cost, excluded from lease liability, recognized when obligation for payment is incurred for finance and operating leases.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAndFinanceLease.label: Property, Plant, and Equipment and Finance Lease Right-of-Use Asset, Accumulated Depreciation and Amortization
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAndFinanceLease.description: Amount of accumulated depreciation and amortization from plant, property, and equipment and right-of-use asset from finance lease.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAndFinanceLease.label: Property, Plant, and Equipment and Finance Lease Right-of-Use Asset, after Accumulated Depreciation and Amortization
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAndFinanceLease.description: Amount, after accumulated depreciation and amortization, of property, plant, and equipment and finance lease right-of-use asset.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAndFinanceLease.label: Property, Plant, and Equipment and Finance Lease Right-of-Use Asset, before Accumulated Depreciation and Amortization
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAndFinanceLease.description: Amount, before accumulated depreciation and amortization, of property, plant, and equipment and finance lease right-of-use asset.

TreasuryStockValueAcquiredParValueMethod.label: Treasury Stock, Value, Acquired, Par Value Method
TreasuryStockValueAcquiredParValueMethod.description: Equity impact of the cost of common and preferred stock that were repurchased during the period. Recorded using the par value method.

PreferredStockAmountOfPreferredDividends.label: Preferred Stock, Amount of Preferred Dividends in Arrears
PreferredStockAmountOfPreferredDividends.description: Aggregate amount of cumulative preferred dividends in arrears.

TreasuryStockRetiredParValueMethodAmount.label: Treasury Stock, Retired, Par Value Method, Amount
TreasuryStockRetiredParValueMethodAmount.description: Amount of decrease of par value, additional paid in capital (APIC) and retained earnings of common and preferred stock retired from treasury when treasury stock is accounted for under the par value method.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Gain (Loss), before Adjustment, after Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.description: Amount, after tax and before adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Gain (Loss), after Adjustment and Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.description: Amount, after tax and adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

PaymentsOfFinancingCosts.label: Payments of Financing Costs
PaymentsOfFinancingCosts.description: The cash outflow for loan and debt issuance costs.

PaymentsToAcquireRetainedInterestInSecur.label: Payments to Acquire Retained Interest in Securitized Receivables
PaymentsToAcquireRetainedInterestInSecur.description: The cash outflow for the purchase of a retained interest in a receivable securitized via a structured process whereby interests in loans and other receivables are packaged, underwritten, and sold in the form of asset-backed securities.

TreasuryStockCommonShares.label: Treasury Stock, Common, Shares
TreasuryStockCommonShares.description: Number of previously issued common shares repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury.

TreasuryStockCommonValue.label: Treasury Stock, Common, Value
TreasuryStockCommonValue.description: Amount allocated to previously issued common shares repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury.

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAllowanceF.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Allowance for Credit Loss, Not Previously Recorded
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAllowanceF.description: Amount of expense for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), for which no credit loss was previously recorded.

ProceedsFromCollectionOfRetainedInterest.label: Proceeds from Collection of Retained Interest in Securitized Receivables
ProceedsFromCollectionOfRetainedInterest.description: Amount of cash inflow from collection on beneficial interest in securitization of receivables.

ProvisionForLoanLossesExpensed.label: Financing Receivable, Credit Loss, Expense (Reversal)
ProvisionForLoanLossesExpensed.description: Amount of credit loss expense (reversal of expense) for financing receivable.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityCurrent.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Current
FinanceLeaseLiabilityCurrent.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from finance lease, classified as current.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Noncurrent
FinanceLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from finance lease, classified as noncurrent.

FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAsset.label: Finance Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, after Accumulated Amortization
FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAsset.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of right-of-use asset from finance lease.

FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetAccumulatedAm.label: Finance Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, Accumulated Amortization
FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetAccumulatedAm.description: Amount of accumulated amortization of right-of-use asset from finance lease.

FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetBeforeAccumul.label: Finance Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, before Accumulated Amortization
FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetBeforeAccumul.description: Amount, before accumulated amortization, of right-of-use asset from finance lease.

LeaseholdImprovementsGross.label: Leasehold Improvements, Gross
LeaseholdImprovementsGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation of additions or improvements to assets held under a lease arrangement.

RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForFina.label: Right-of-Use Asset Obtained in Exchange for Finance Lease Liability
RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForFina.description: Amount of increase in right-of-use asset obtained in exchange for finance lease liability.

FinanceLeaseInterestExpense.label: Finance Lease, Interest Expense
FinanceLeaseInterestExpense.description: Amount of interest expense on finance lease liability.

FinanceLeaseLiability.label: Finance Lease, Liability
FinanceLeaseLiability.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from finance lease.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Payment, Due
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueNextTwel.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year One
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueNextTwel.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFive.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Five
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFive.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFour.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Four
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFour.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearThre.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Three
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearThre.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearTwo.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Two
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearTwo.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityUndiscountedExcessA.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Undiscounted Excess Amount
FinanceLeaseLiabilityUndiscountedExcessA.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments in excess of discounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease.

FinanceLeasePrincipalPayments.label: Finance Lease, Principal Payments
FinanceLeasePrincipalPayments.description: Amount of cash outflow for principal payment on finance lease.

FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortization.label: Finance Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, Amortization
FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortization.description: Amount of amortization expense attributable to right-of-use asset from finance lease.

FinanceLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRateP.label: Finance Lease, Weighted Average Discount Rate, Percent
FinanceLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRateP.description: Weighted average discount rate for finance lease calculated at point in time.

ProceedsFromConvertibleDebt.label: Proceeds from Convertible Debt
ProceedsFromConvertibleDebt.description: The cash inflow from the issuance of a long-term debt instrument which can be exchanged for a specified amount of another security, typically the entity's common stock, at the option of the issuer or the holder.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfOtherLongTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Other Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfOtherLongTermDebt.description: Amount of cash inflow from issuance of long-term debt classified as other.

RepaymentsOfLongTermLinesOfCredit.label: Repayments of Long-term Lines of Credit
RepaymentsOfLongTermLinesOfCredit.description: The cash outflow for the settlement of obligation drawn from a contractual arrangement with the lender, including letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a specific amount at any point in time with maturities due beyond one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

AllowanceForDoubtfulOtherReceivablesCurr.label: Allowance for Doubtful Other Receivables, Current
AllowanceForDoubtfulOtherReceivablesCurr.description: Amount of valuation allowance for receivables classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherReceivablesGrossCurrent.label: Other Receivables, Gross, Current
OtherReceivablesGrossCurrent.description: Amount, before allowance, of receivables classified as other, due within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

PaymentsToAcquireLifeInsurancePolicies.label: Payment to Acquire Life Insurance Policy, Investing Activities
PaymentsToAcquireLifeInsurancePolicies.description: Amount of cash outflow for payment of premium on corporate-owned life insurance policy, classified as investing activities. Includes, but is not limited to, bank-owned life insurance policy.

WriteOffOfDeferredDebtIssuanceCost.label: Write off of Deferred Debt Issuance Cost
WriteOffOfDeferredDebtIssuanceCost.description: Write-off of amounts previously capitalized as debt issuance cost in an extinguishment of debt.

NumberOfReportableSegments.label: Number of Reportable Segments
NumberOfReportableSegments.description: Number of segments reported by the entity. A reportable segment is a component of an entity for which there is an accounting requirement to report separate financial information on that component in the entity's financial statements.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfConvertiblePreferr.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Convertible Preferred Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfConvertiblePreferr.description: The cash inflow from issuance of preferred stocks identified as being convertible into another form of financial instrument, typically the entity's common stock.

ProceedsFromLifeInsurancePolicies.label: Proceeds from Life Insurance Policy
ProceedsFromLifeInsurancePolicies.description: Amount of cash inflow for proceeds from settlement of corporate-owned life insurance policy, classified as investing activities. Includes, but is not limited to, bank-owned life insurance policy.
